fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Night actions resolve in reverse order.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Fuck a player up each night. This ability has the lowest possible priority (i.e. the highest). Thus, any actions that player would perform or that would be done to them won't happen, since they're already dead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who would oppose you.
